In England, in the seven days to 12 June, there were 42,332 new confirmed cases (75.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 June, there were 28,349 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 49% (13,983 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 June is 4,010,977 (7,125.9 cases per 100,000 population).
